actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: To make emergency supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2002 to provide relief from damages caused by flooding in the Guadalupe River valley in 2002.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Makes emergency supplemental appropriations to the Army Corps of Engineers for FY 2002 for the repair of damages to the Canyon Lake project in Texas caused by flooding in the Guadalupe River valley in 2002.

titles.title: To make emergency supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2002 to provide relief from damages caused by flooding in the Guadalupe River valley in 2002.
